message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It is a unique opportunity to acquire an item that holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Given its importance, I am offering it to you at a special price of $12,500. This represents a substantial discount compared to its true worth, making it an attractive investment for someone like you who recognizes its potential value. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further.
